articles.description: PACCAR (NASDAQ:PCAR – Get Free Report) was upgraded by equities researchers at Argus from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating in a research note issued on Monday, MarketBeat Ratings reports. The brokerage currently has a $121.00 price objective on the stock. Ar…
